column5: This private 2 bedroom duplex is located in a quiet, cozy, South Austin neighborhood close to parks and multiple shopping centers.  This newly renovated and contemporary designed space includes one of a kind photography and artwork. Each room includes a comfortable queen size bed that accommodates 2 guests. The couch folds out into a bed to fit one adult comfortably, two snuggly.   Private parking space is available behind the property and the Bus stop is just feet away from the front door.
column8: Home Base!! Perfect for Couples or Families
